attributes.action: Impeach all members of the house of commons & house of Lords on the grounds that their integrity as Statesmen representing our people and country is fundamentally flawed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long our so called government has sat in its parlimentry castle engorging their ego's and wallets with tax payers money, whilst privaricating, pedeling lies and unseemingly robbing the british tax payer protected by laws introduced by them to protect themselves.
By signing this petition you will be sending a message directly to those in power that they cannot carry on with this circus and should stand down with immeadiate affect!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
